section.title: EMERGENCY POWERS
section.p: Message from Her Majesty [7th February], considered.

p.membercontribution: : The Message from Her Majesty is as follows:
p.quote: The Emergency Powers Act 1920, as amended by the Emergency Powers Act 1964 ...
We, Councellors of State, to whom have been delegated certain Royal Functions ...

section.p: Resolved, That an Humble Address be presented to Her Majesty... [Mr. Carlisle.]
